content: in this legal case a court in verona has made a final decision regarding the division of an inherited estate the court assigned specific assets to each party involved including a building with multiple floors surrounding land with vineyards and other assets the court also established easements for pedestrian access and utility connections the defendant has been ordered to pay compensation to the coheirs for the use of a specific flat the court dismissed the defendants request for reimbursement of improvement costs and damages each party will bear their own legal costs and the judgment will be transcribed by the land agency
